sourcesContent:
Новая категория
Количество символов меньше 3
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { EventEmitterService } from '../event-emitter.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-modal', templateUrl: './modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./modal.component.css'], }) export class ModalComponent { private baseUrl: string = ""; public category: Category = { id:0, name:'' }; http: HttpClient; public hideModal: boolean = false; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string, private eventEmitterService: EventEmitterService) { this.baseUrl = baseUrl; this.http = http; } firstComponentFunction() { this.eventEmitterService.onButtonClick(); } public addCategory() { return this.http.post(this.baseUrl + 'Category/',this.category).subscribe(result => { console.log("ConsoleLOG" + result); this.Close(); }); } Close() { this.hideModal = !this.hideModal; } } interface Category { id: number; name: string; }
